data.name: I AM BUTTER VR  Official
data.detailed_description:
Based on the preemptive version, New chapters’ DLC has been added in I Am Butter VR Full Version,including the fast food kitchen in Chapter 2 and the butter factory in Chapter 3.The two new scenes will be several times larger than the first one.At the same time,various challenges are added in,such as new mechanisms, new puzzles.

The contents added in this DLC mainly include:
1.New chapters:the fast food kitchen & the butter factory.
2.Chapter scoring system.
3.Optimization of the support for game handle.
4.Optimization of others in the chapters.
data.about_the_game:
Based on the preemptive version, New chapters’ DLC has been added in I Am Butter VR Full Version,including the fast food kitchen in Chapter 2 and the butter factory in Chapter 3.The two new scenes will be several times larger than the first one.At the same time,various challenges are added in,such as new mechanisms, new puzzles.

The contents added in this DLC mainly include:
1.New chapters:the fast food kitchen & the butter factory.
2.Chapter scoring system.
3.Optimization of the support for game handle.
4.Optimization of others in the chapters.
data.short_description: Imagine you are incarnated as a small piece of butter in common scenes such as kitchens and fast food restaurants，use your cleverness and endurance to jump to the end step by step! The bottles and cans that can be taken easily at ordinary times have become inaccessible mountains in front of you!
data.supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1030 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Skylake or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
